===============================================================================
(2, 3)
Convenient and common, but also Fibonacci powers

(2,17)
Primes which are nearly powers of one another, 2^4 ≈ 17 

Critical Pair 	| pq(n) 			| pq(n+2)/pq(n+1)
2^1 2^2 	| 8                             | 4
2^2 2^3 	| 32                            | 2
2^3 2^4 	| 128                           | 2

17^10 2^41 	| 4433217470138334574542848     | 272
